system.description:
The meat from a dead mirelurk Queen. This meat can make for a great feast, as it is nutrient rich and incredibly filling, leaving a sense of health and wellbeing in any who eat it, even raw. When cooked, these effects are even more pronounced.

Queen mirelurk meat can be cooked to produce Mirelurk Queen Steak.
system.effect: May re-roll 1d20 on all END tests until end of next scene
